Amazing game, and the sequel is even better! The first game serves you various tests like you're a lab rat trying to move through an obstacle course. It teaches you portal and gravity physics which you'll need to solve later puzzles. The second game is way more fun but requires the experience gained from the first game to properly enjoy. Both games will provide you many hours of great fun!
